XIV.6.1.a
.
Identification of Potential Duplicate Payment Cases
Regional offices (ROs) receive a list of records under their jurisdiction in which identical Social Security numbers (SSNs) appear.Â  The list of potential duplicate records is generated weekly.
The records identified on the list represent cases in which the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA)
might be
erroneously paying duplicate benefits to the same payee.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 6 - Review of Potential Duplicate Payment Cases
